ygData.subject: Re: Staff Question
ygData.msgSnippet: I use the giant snake fang.....Very nice 5 damage.
ygData.messageBody:
I use the giant snake fang.....Very nice 5 damage.

> -----Original Message-----
> From: -Mongoose- [mailto:-Mongoose-@...]
> Sent: Saturday, April 17, 1999 4:38 AM
> To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
> Subject: [eq_wizards] Re: Staff Question
>
>
> From: "-Mongoose-" <-Mongoose-@...>
>
> Well one thing to consider is that later on a wizard will find many
> beneficial items that he can use in the other hand. If you choose
> to use the
> 2h Staff you wont be able to equip them.. I would use the 1h
> Staff or dagger
> myself
>
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Donald Taber <dtaber@...>
> To: EverQuest Mailing List <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
> Date: Friday, April 16, 1999 6:42 PM
> Subject: [eq_wizards] Staff Question
>
>
> >From: Donald Taber <dtaber@...>
> >
> >As a relatively low level wizard, I have found both a one handed
> >staff and a two handed staff. Which skill should I be working on
> >for when I'm a higher level and can get a magic staff? Are magic
> >staffs mainly 1 handed or 2 handed? Either? Any suggestions?
> >
> > Thanks,
> >
> > Soren
> >
